Methods in drcl.inet with parameters of type LinkCost
static void InetUtil.setupRoutes(Node[] nodes_, int[][] adjMatrix_, LinkCost linkcost_)

static void InetUtil.setupRoutes(Component network_, int[][] adjMatrix_, long[] addr_, LinkCost linkcost_)
          Same as #setupRoutes(Component, int[][], LinkCost) except that this method allows node addresses to be arbitrary as specified in addr_.
